TopicTitle: Can't seem to get textures unlimited to work

Articles.Content: Im able to install the mod, but i can't find any texture... things that work. can someone help please?

I’ve not used it but it’s not an ‘end user’ mod, it’s really for mod makers to do things with shaders. As such there’s nothing for the player to use directly as you expect. Having said that, I believe there’s a mod called something like textures unlimited recolour which does (I think) have stuff to use but again not used so not 100%.
